item.title: Home
item.description: Basic infomation My name is Shijian XU (Chinese: 徐世坚). I received my B.Sc. degree in Computer Science and Technology in 2018 from Nanjing University. I have graduated from EPFL with a Master’s degree in Data Science. PDF Education 2020.09 – 2023.02   EPFL, Lausanne, Switzerland Master of Science MSc in Data Science 2014.09 – 2018.06   Nanjing University, Nanjing, China B.Sc. in Computer Science and Technology Research & working experiences 2022.
